title: Power Guard 650VA CS Offline UPS (Plastic Body)

cat_seo_description: Buy Power Guard Offline UPS at the best price in Bangladesh. Latest Power Guard Offline UPS available at Star Tech Shop. Order online & get delivery anywhere in BD.
full_description:
Power Guard 650VA CS Offline UPS (Plastic Body)

The Power Guard 650VA CS Offline UPS comes with Automatic voltage regulation(AVR), High/ Low Voltage Protection, Overload/ Short Protection Cool features. The Power Guard UPS featured an input voltage range of 145-280VAC and a frequency of 50/60Hz+/-5% and also it offers an output voltage of 220/230VAC+/-10%. It has a transfer time of 2~6 ms (Typical) and a Pure Sine Wave. The Power Guard 650VA UPS is equipped with a Lead-Acid Maintenance-Free battery. It takes a recharge time of 6 hours up to 90% capacity. It can deliver a backup time of 05-40 mins (Depending on load). This UPS indicates AC Mode with Green lighting, Battery Mode with Red lighting, and Over Load Yellow lighting, which helps you to identify the UPS status. The Power Guard 650VA CS Offline UPS comes with a 1-year warranty.

full_description:
Power Guard 2000VA PS Offline UPS (Metal Body)

The Power Guard 2000VA PS Offline UPS comes with Automatic voltage regulation(AVR), High/ Low Voltage Protection, Overload/ Short Protection Cool. This Power Guard UPS featured an input voltage range of 175-275 VAC and a frequency of 50/60Hz+/-5%. It offers an output voltage of 220/230VAC+/-10%. It has a transfer time of 2~4 ms (Typical) and a Pure Sine Wave. This Power Guard 2000VA CS UPS has an LED Indicator, AC Mode: Green lighting, Battery Mode: Red lighting, Over Load: Yellow lighting. The Power Guard 2000VA UPS is equipped with a 2 Pcs with 12V & 9Ah Battery, Lead-Acid Maintenance-Free battery. It takes a recharge time of 6 hours up to 90% capacity. The Power Guard 2000VA UPS delivers a backup time of 35-40 mins (Depending on load). The Power Guard 2000VA PS Offline UPS offers 01-year warranty.
